hotels.title: Boutique Reading Townhouse Luxury near London
hotels.description: There’s good reason The Roseate Reading was dubbed the ‘UK’s Sexiest Townhouse Hotel’ by the Evening Standard. Pass through the doors of the historic red-brick building to discover interiors that are just as grand as the façade: chandeliers dripping with Italian glass beads, vaulted ceilings, elaborate wood carvings and crackling fireplaces all contribute to an atmosphere of cosy, art-inspired luxury, complemented by paintings and sculptures sourced from around the world. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, the hotel is nestled conveniently between London and the Oxfordshire countryside, a fabulous base for exploring southern England. See the sights of the Big Smoke, indulge in a luxury shopping spree at the world-famous Bicester Village, lose yourself in the charming Cotswolds villages, visit the dreaming spires of Oxford University, or make the short 30-minute drive to Heston Blumenthal's world-famous restaurant, The Fat Duck. You might even venture down to seaside Brighton, just a 1.5-hour drive away. Back at your hotel, relax in boutique splendour and treat yourself to a blissful spa treatment, European cuisine or traditional British afternoon tea.

hotels.title: UK Stylish Reading Sanctuary Overlooking River Loddon with Spa
hotels.description: Take in the green fields and nature reserves of the charming country village of Winnersh with a stay at Crowne Plaza Reading East, an IHG Hotel. Immerse yourself in this quaint Berkshire town or spend a day at nearby Ascot Racecourse. Reset your mind and body with a spa treatment at Esprit Wellness & Spa, peruse creative cocktails served on the terrace as you gaze at landscaped gardens, or indulge in modern British and Indian cuisine at Caprice Restaurant & Terrace.

hotels.title: Stylish Reading Escape near London & Windsor Castle
hotels.description: Enjoy the best of both worlds with a stay at the stylish voco Reading, an IHG Hotel, just 25 minutes from London by train. As the gateway to the idyllic Berkshire countryside, this buzzy town is packed with charm, beautiful buildings, perfectly manicured gardens and historical gems. Explore the nearby Madejski Stadium, Green Park, Legoland or Windsor Castle, or simply relax at your well-equipped hotel.
